subject: [Radiance-general] Ximage (in Ubuntu?)
body:
Hi all,

Is anybody able to get the i command in ximage to work? I've tried it on
Ubuntu (8.04 and 9.04) without luck. It's supposed to draw a random color
for all pixels similar to  the pixel selected, effectively giving you an
isoline. It's talked about in section 7.3 in RwR.

Thanks in advance,

--Dave
